example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="column">
    <Stack direction="column">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h3">
        Small
      </Heading>
      <CarrierLogo
        size="small"
        carriers={[
          {
            code: "OK",
            type: "airline",
            name: "Czech Airlines",
          },
        ]}
      />
    </Stack>
    <Stack direction="column">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h3">
        Medium
      </Heading>
      <CarrierLogo
        size="medium"
        carriers={[
          {
            code: "OK",
            type: "airline",
            name: "Czech Airlines",
          },
        ]}
      />
    </Stack>
    <Stack direction="column">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h3">
        Large
      </Heading>
      <CarrierLogo
        carriers={[
          {
            code: "OK",
            type: "airline",
            name: "Czech Airlines",
          },
        ]}
      />
    </Stack>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Sizes
info.description: Logos can be small, medium, or large (the default). Note that this only applies to single logos and does not work for multiple logos. Multiple logos are always small.
